text: man-yag geudaedeul-i jang-geoli idong jung-igo seogileul guhaji moshaessdamyeon jeodangdoen jeondangmul-ila. geuligo man-yag geudaedeul seologa seolo-ege anjeonham-eul neukkindamyeon sutag bad-eun janeun jasin-ui sutagmul-eul doedollyeo judolog hago jasin-ui junim-isin hananim-eul dulyeowohadolog hala. geudaedeul-eun jeung-eon-eul gamchuji malla. geugeos(jeung-eon)eul gamchuneun ja issdaneun sillo geuneun geuui ma-eum-i joejieun jala. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i haenghaneun geos-eul asineun bun-ila
